properties_manager

Class PropertiesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • properties_manager.PropertiesManager

  • public class PropertiesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for loading properties from XML files that can then be used throughout an application. Note that this class is a singleton, and so can be accessed from anywhere. To get the singleton properties manager, just use the static accessor:

    PropertiesManager props = PropertiesManager.getPropertiesManager();

    Now you can access all the properties it currently stores using the getProperty method. Note that the properties_schema.xsd file specifies how these files are to be constructed. Also note that it is designed to be used with enumerations such that properties are sent in as objects and keyed using their toStrings.

    • Method Detail

      • getPropertiesManager

        public static PropertiesManager getPropertiesManager()
        This is the static accessor for the singleton.
        Returns:
        The singleton properties manager object.

      • addProperty

        public void addProperty(java.lang.Object property,
                        java.lang.String value)
        This function adds the (property, value) tuple to the properties manager.
        Parameters:
        property - Key, i.e. property type for this pair.
        value - The data for this pair.

      • getProperty

        public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.Object property)
        Accessor method for getting a property from this manager.
        Parameters:
        property - The key for getting a property.
        Returns:
        The value associated with the key.

      • hasProperty

        public boolean hasProperty(java.lang.Object property)
        Accessor method for testing to see if a particular property has been loaded.
        Parameters:
        property - The key for getting a property.
        Returns:
        true if property has been loaded, false otherwise.

      • getPropertyOptionsList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getPropertyOptionsList(java.lang.Object property)
        Accessor method for getting a property options list associated with the property key.
        Parameters:
        property - The key for accessing the property options list.
        Returns:
        The property options list associated with the key.

      • loadProperties

        public void loadProperties(java.lang.String xmlDataFile,
                           java.lang.String xmlSchemaFile)
                    throws InvalidXMLFileFormatException
        This function loads the xmlDataFile in this property manager, first make sure it's a well formed document according to the rules specified in the xmlSchemaFile.
        Parameters:
        xmlDataFile - XML document to load.
        xmlSchemaFile - Schema that the XML document should conform to.
        Throws:
        InvalidXMLFileFormatException - This is thrown if the XML file is invalid.
